title: True Love Is a Kink
content:
Diamanda Hagan: What kind of crazy mother-fucker has a fantasy like that? "I want to get married with someone I love so very much and"... why am I alone? 

Random Minion: I'm here for you, mistress. [walks up and hugs Diamanda Hagan] 

Diamanda Hagan: Get the fuck away from me! [brandishing a knife up to Random Minion] 

Random Minion: That's why you're alone. True Love is not this attainable thing that one could find and put in a cage and listen to it sing all the ding-dong day. Love (true or otherwise) is like water; it changes form, can only stay in the palm of your hand until it drains through and inevitably dries out completely. ...That Came Out Wrong.

Pictured as an erotic form of Mundane Made Awesome, True Love (or at least an adult game based around it) can really stimulate certain erogenous zones based on idealistic nostalgia alone. Vanilla-scented candles, heart-shaped boxes full of chocolate-flavored condoms, elaborately-laced wedding-dresses (for both the "bride" and "the groom"), engagement rings (and not for fingers if. You. Know. What. I'm. Saying!), heart-shaped pasties... edible wedding-garters... licking wedding cake off of one another...

...I'm sorry, I'm going to need a few minutes...

See also Casual Kink, Last Wish Marriage, Marry for Love, In Love with Love, W.A.F.F. and Your Normal Is Our Taboo. Compare Good People Have Good Sex and True Love Is Exceptional and contrast True Love Is Boring. Can also occur with Insatiable Newlyweds.
